title: Minecraft Networking is not recommended and is consider very slow, please set...
txt_content:
[11:00:02 警告] [11:00:02][FINE][noppes.npcs.controllers.DialogController:34] 启动完成 loading Dialogs

[11:00:02 信息] Minecraft Networking is not recommended and is consider very slow, please setup UDP.
[11:00:02 信息] Started [Minecraft] Server.
[11:00:02 信息] 已停止服务器
[11:00:02 信息] [SQLibrary] Disabling SQLibrary v7.1

Help~~ How to solve this problem？ 
第一次发帖     - 。-
